articles.author: WION Video Team
articles.title: North America & Asia might collide to form the next supercontinent 'Amasia' on Earth - WION
articles.description: The Next supercontinent is in the making. Today, there are seven continents. Some 200 million years from now there will be just one. Geophysicist Ross Mitchell has recently unveiled in his new book 'The Next Supercontinent'. Watch this video to know more.

articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Asian Games 2023: Bajrang Punia and Vinesh Phogat break silence after direct selection controversy - India Today
articles.description: Bajrang Punia and Vinesh Phogat have broken their silence on the Asian Games selection controversy and claimed that they were ready to take a step back from wrestling if proven wrong. The duo were given direct entry for the games, without having to go through…
articles.content: By Press Trust of India: Facing the wrestling fraternity's wrath for accepting exemption from the Asian Games trials, Vinesh Phogat and Bajrang Punia on Monday said they are hurt that young wresters … [+3384 chars]
